name: Blood Cube
description:
Blood Cube: A prototype made in 7 days for the 7DFPS game jam (okay maybe 8 days)

Shoot the enemies and hoover up their blood cubes. The more you pick up, the faster you run. If you go under 100 you'll slow down and start to black out. 

Controls

Menu: M 
Bandage: E
Hoover: F
Jump: Space
Move: WASD
